data.message: Dear Eminem, U helped me through many shit...Even when u werent there physically Ur songs gave me the strength to keep on moving...when shit was fucked up i just got up and was NOT AFRAID of anything that came towards me....I love you Marshall mathers you are my Hero......<3 <3 <3 <3 Ps drop a new album plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz......I know you hear this everyday but i am your biggest STAN.......
